summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting final versions of a Rule 404(b) notice and a CC identities notice to their team in preparation for providing them to the defense in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the legal notices (Rule 404(b) and CC identities) being prepared by the prosecution team.

events.title: Prosecution Prepares 404(b) and CC Identities Notices
events.description: The prosecution team finalizes and transmits a Rule 404(b) notice and a CC identities notice regarding defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The prosecution was preparing to provide the defense with a Rule 404(b) notice regarding Ghislaine Maxwell.
The prosecution was also preparing to provide a 'CC identities' notice, likely related to witness or victim identities.
The correspondence indicates an ongoing pre-trial discovery process in the Maxwell case as of October 2021.
The communication originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
